## ðŸ§  Key Components

### Control Panel
- Dashboard (versions, deployments, metrics)
- Topology View (handlers â†’ modules â†’ effects)

---

## ðŸ”§ Tech Stack

- **Framework:** Next.js 14 (App Router)
- **API:** TRPC for type-safe APIs
- **UI:** Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- **Charts:** Recharts or Chart.js
- **Visualization:** React Flow or D3.js
- **Auth:** TOTP with qrcode generation
- **State:** Zustand or React Query

---

## ðŸ“‹ Typical Tasks

- "Create control panel dashboard showing active versions"
- "Build API Playground route explorer with auto-complete"
- "Implement topology graph using React Flow"
- "Create log viewer with real-time updates"
- "Build TOTP authentication flow"
